To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RateOfChangePercent _rocp;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rocp = ROCP(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rocp.IsReady)
{
    var current = _rocp.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rocp = self.ROCP(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rocp.IsReady:
    current = self.rocp.Current.Value
